overview: For the millions who can't have enough of the inimitable insatiable Amber Lynn, Video proudly presents the ultimate feast - 90 minutes of mind-blowing and bone-stiffening action with no dull stuff to lower the heat and slow the beat. And Amber going at it Non-Stop is like a roller coaster. Once you get on, you stay on, until you get off.
title: Amber Lynn Non-stop
